abstract: Authorities are still trying to find out how report of gunfire outside security checkpoint at Terminal 8 of Kennedy International Airport, later proven to be false alarm, sent entire airport into hysteria; passengers say lack of communication and poor guidance from airport officials are to blame.

headline.print_headline: False Alarm, Then Panic: Chaos at J.F.K. Airport
headline.main: From False Alarm to Panic: Inside Kennedy Airport’s Chaotic Night

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Officials said there was no evidence that a report of gunfire at J.F.K. on Sunday night was a deliberate hoax. What followed, they said, was a sign of the times....
lead_paragraph: Officials said there was no evidence that a report of gunfire at J.F.K. on Sunday night was a deliberate hoax. What followed, they said, was a sign of the times.
